text: Our connected vehicle backend
relies on numerous
virtual cloud instances, storages
and databases,

and we operate this 24/7
worldwide with a reliability rate

We cannot pull the plug
on an AWS data center
to test our resilience, so we had

to think about new strategies
to test our resilience.

So that's why we designed
chaos experiments
for our most critical components.
The goal was
to execute these experiments in production
with no to minimal customer impact
and low effort.
We chose AWS Fault Injection Service.
It allowed us to create repeatable
and automated test scenarios
and avoid the risk of human errors.

When our customers buy
a premium product like a

BMW, they have high expectations
regarding availability
and experience.

AWS Fault Injection
Service helped us uncover
problems and fix them.

In 2025, we will develop
a self service portal so
that each product team can use AWS
Fault Injection Service
in an automated way. It's crucial
to find a cloud infrastructure
that scales in the right operation

model. AWS has been a
reliable partner for years.
